::Bloodystrike::

With an expression bordering on confusion, surprise, and uncertainty, 
Bloodystrike shakes his head at the offer of bugs.

"Um, no thank you," he says, "But you're one of the merchants, right?"




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Ralph Ares" <ralph@i...> wrote:
> ::Snitch::
> 
> "Nope." He giggles, still upside-down. "Merchants plural. Highly
> inappropriate for singular designation of individual Snitch. 
Hehehehehee!"
> The monkey looks around and lets go of the vine, landing on his feet
> perfectly. "Snitch be in space long time. Not get to see planet 
surface in
> over t'erty decacycles." He sniffs, then lifts up a rock and 
snatches some
> bugs and shoves them into his mouth. "Ooooo! Buggies goood!" He 
spins around
> and holds out a fist full of creepy crawlers. "Want some?"
